app.name: MigrantHub
app.mission: Our mission is to help you work simply and legally in Russia

auth.title: Sign in to MigrantHub

phone.title: Sign in by phone
phone.subtitle: Enter your phone number to receive a code
phone.sendError: SMS sending error. Try again later.

otp.title: Enter code
otp.subtitle: Code sent to number
otp.verifyError: Code verification error. Try again later.

method.title: Sign in method
method.subtitle: Choose a convenient authorization method

phone.title: By phone number
phone.description: Get an SMS code to sign in

method.securityNote: Your data is protected and stored in encrypted form

demo.title: Demo
demo.phoneHint: Enter any number in format +7 (XXX) XXX-XX-XX. Verification code: 1234

auth.terms: By continuing, you agree to the terms of use and privacy policy
auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

recovery.title: Restore Access
recovery.subtitle: Enter your 12-character recovery code
recovery.helpText: The recovery code was provided when you first registered. If you lost it, please contact support.

error.invalid: Invalid recovery code. Please check and try again.

welcome.tagline: Your personal protector. We help you process documents quickly, avoid fines, and stay in control of your legalization journey.

safety.title: Life Without Fear
safety.description: We ensure legal compliance at every step. No more worrying about inspections or unexpected complications.

language.title: Everything in Your Language
language.description: Russian laws are complex, but we explain them in plain language. No barriers - you'll understand exactly what you're signing.

savings.title: Money to Family, Not Middlemen
savings.description: Process documents directly through the app - save money on middlemen and protect yourself from fake receipts and registrations.

technology.title: Technology on Your Side
technology.description: AI monitors your deadlines 24/7. People forget; our system never does.

honesty.title: Honesty and Transparency
honesty.description: We never promise the impossible. We provide a legal path so you can work with confidence and build a future in Russia.

agreement.text: I accept the User Agreement and Privacy Policy, and consent to the processing of my personal data

legal.title: Legal Processing
legal.description: Work patent, registration, and migration records in full compliance with Russian law

documents.title: Document Storage
documents.description: Secure encrypted storage for your document copies

notifications.title: Reminders
notifications.description: Timely notifications about patent and registration deadlines

map.title: Services Map
map.description: Migration offices, medical centers, exam locations, and more nearby

warning.title: Important
warning.description: We do not provide fake registrations. We only operate within Russian law. The app helps you process documents correctly.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: I have read and accept the terms of use of the application

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: I agree to the processing of my personal data

legalOnly.title: Legal actions
legalOnly.description: I understand that the app only helps with legal document processing

login.title: Create a profile
login.subtitle: To save results and receive reminders

benefits.save_results_desc: Your progress and documents are always at hand
benefits.history_desc: Access to check and consultation history

login.privacy_note: Your data is stored only on your device

language.title: Select language
language.subtitle: Which language is most comfortable for you?

citizenship.title: Your citizenship
citizenship.subtitle: This will help us provide relevant information

profiling.title: Profiling
profiling.subtitle: Tell us about yourself for personalization
profiling.purposeWarning: To obtain a work patent, select "Work". You cannot change your purpose of visit without leaving Russia (except for Eurasian Economic Union citizens).

languages.aiNote: The interface will be translated automatically. Minor inaccuracies are possible.

profile.title: My Profile

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteDataWarning: This action is irreversible. All documents and history will be deleted.
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all data? This action is irreversible.

profile.dateHint: Changing entry date will recalculate the 90/180 days counter
profile.purposeHint: Changing the purpose of visit may affect patent eligibility
profile.eaeuNote: Eurasian Economic Union: Patent not required

qrCode.title: Identity Card
qrCode.hint: Show this QR code for quick identity verification

notificationArrival.title: Foreign citizen arrival notification
notificationArrival.description: Initial migration registration within 7 working days after entry

registrationExtension.title: Stay extension application
registrationExtension.description: Migration registration extension with valid grounds

departureNotification.title: Departure notification
departureNotification.description: When changing place of stay or leaving Russia

patentReissue.title: Patent reissue application
patentReissue.description: Patent extension for the next year

patentDuplicate.title: Patent duplicate application
patentDuplicate.description: If patent is lost or damaged

employerNotification.title: Employment Contract Notification
employerNotification.description: Employer must notify the migration office within 3 days

employerTermination.title: Employment Termination Notification
employerTermination.description: Employer notifies the migration office upon dismissal

invitationLetter.title: Invitation petition
invitationLetter.description: Invitation of a foreign citizen to Russia

sampleData.tooltip: Fill form with example data to see the format

scanner.title: Scan Document
scanner.instructions: Make sure the photo is clear and all data is visible
scanner.tip: For better recognition, use good lighting
scanner.verifyHint: Check the data and edit if necessary
scanner.noDataExtracted: Could not extract data from the image
scanner.recognitionFailed: Could not recognize document. Try taking a better quality photo.
scanner.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection.
scanner.offlineQueued: Request saved. Recognition will be performed when connected to the network.

tips.angle: Hold the camera parallel to the document
tips.focus: Make sure the image is sharp

otherServices.title: Other services
otherServices.subtitle: Additional tools
otherServices.tip: Tip: These tools will help you in everyday life in Russia.

banCheck.title: Ban Check
banCheck.subtitle: Entry Restrictions
banCheck.description: Check for entry ban to Russia

calculator.title: 90 Days Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Days per year
calculator.description: Calculate remaining legal stay days for the current year
calculator.exitDateHint: Leave exit date empty if you are still in Russia
calculator.rule: From 05.02.2025: you can stay in Russia for no more than 90 days per calendar year (January 1 - December 31)
calculator.calendarYearNote: Counter resets on January 1st each year

exemptions.title: This rule does NOT apply to:

items.eaeu: Eurasian Economic Union citizens with employment contract

deportationMode.title: Deportation Regime
deportationMode.subtitle: Effective from 05.02.2025
deportationMode.description: If you violate the stay period, the deportation regime may be applied with the following restrictions:

consequences.license: Ban on obtaining a driver's license
consequences.leave: Obligation to leave Russia within the deadline

resetLimit.title: Limit reset
resetLimit.daysUntil: In {days} days the limit will reset

patentCalculator.title: Patent Calculator
patentCalculator.subtitle: Calculate patent cost
patentCalculator.infoNote: Data is current as of today. Check with migration authorities for updates.

patentCheck.title: Patent Check
patentCheck.subtitle: Check patent status
patentCheck.infoNote: Verification is performed using official migration databases

exam.title: Russian exam
exam.subtitle: Trainer
exam.description: Prepare for the Russian language exam

permitStatus.title: Permit Status
permitStatus.subtitle: Check application status
permitStatus.infoHint: Data is checked against official government databases. The result reflects the current status of your application.

errors.checkFailed: Could not check status. Please try again later.

reminder.title: Important information
reminder.rule1: Patent payment must be made monthly
reminder.rule2: Delay of more than 1 day leads to patent cancellation

detained.title: I was detained
detained.showDocumentsCalmly: Present your passport and registration calmly
detained.rightToRecord: You have the right to record video (Article 29, Russian Constitution)
detained.demandProtocol: Demand a protocol in a language you understand
detained.dontBeRude: Do not be rude or resist
detained.rightToTranslator: Right to an interpreter (Article 25.10, Administrative Code)
detained.rightNotToSign: Right not to sign the protocol without understanding
detained.demandStatement: Say: "I demand an interpreter and a lawyer. I will not sign the protocol."
detained.demandConsulate: Demand contact with the consulate (Vienna Convention)
detained.dontSignWithoutTranslator: Do not sign anything without an interpreter
detained.recordOfficerInfo: Write down officers' names and department number

lostDocuments.title: Lost documents
lostDocuments.subtitle: Document recovery
lostDocuments.timeLimit: The document must be recovered within 3 days

instructions.title: What to do when detained
instructions.step2: Ask the officer to show their ID
instructions.step3: Do not sign documents you don't understand
instructions.step6: Write down the officer's name and rank

rights.title: Your rights
rights.right4: Right not to testify against yourself

passport.instruction: Passport. Go to the police for a loss report, then to the Consulate for recovery.
steps: Get a travel document or new passport

migCard.instruction: Migration card. Recovered at the migration department (only after passport recovery).
steps: Contact the migration department at your place of stay

greenCard.instruction: Green card. Duplicate issued at the migration center or migration department.

education.instruction: Certificate/Diploma. Contact the testing center or educational institution for a duplicate.

registration.instruction: Registration. Done by the host at the migration department.

patent.instruction: Patent. At the migration center that issued the patent (full document package required).
steps: Pay the state fee for the duplicate

receipts.instruction: Receipts. At the migration center that issued the patent (full document package required).

contract.instruction: Employment contract. Request a copy from your employer.

insurance.instruction: Health insurance policy. Contact the insurance company for a duplicate.

inn.instruction: TIN/SNILS. Contact the tax office or public services center.

family.instruction: Marriage/birth certificate. Contact the registry office where the act was registered.

hero.title: Legalization wizard
hero.subtitle: Personal document plan
hero.description: Answer a few questions and get a step-by-step plan for processing all necessary documents

checklist.title: Document Checklist
checklist.subtitle: Simulate your situation and track deadlines
checklist.fill_simulator: Enter your entry date and citizenship to calculate deadlines
checklist.eaeu_info: Eurasian Economic Union citizens (Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Armenia, Belarus) have simplified conditions: 30 days for registration, right to work without a patent.
checklist.info: Check off documents as you receive them.
checklist.legal_disclaimer: This information is for reference only. Deadlines may vary by region and individual situation. Consult a lawyer for accurate advice.

risks.registration: Fine 2-5K ₽, possible deportation and entry ban
risks.medical: Patent will not be issued without certificates
risks.stay_limit: Violation of stay rules, deportation, 3-10 year entry ban

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.subtitle: Help 24/7
assistant.greeting: Hello! I'm your personal migration assistant. How can I help you?

disclaimer.text: This information is for reference purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. For specific issues, please consult a specialist.

lawyerModal.title: Lawyer Consultation
lawyerModal.willCallBack: A lawyer will contact you within 15 minutes
lawyerModal.partnerDescription: We work with verified migration lawyers with over 5 years of experience
lawyerModal.whatsappMessage: Hello! I need a migration lawyer consultation.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.subtitle: Ask any question
chat.emptyDescription: Ask a question about migration, documents or legal issues
chat.piiWarningText: Do not send document numbers, passports or other personal data in the chat.

notifications.paymentReminderDesc: Don't forget to pay for the patent
notifications.documentReadyDesc: Your document is ready for download

messages.patentPaymentBody: Don't forget to pay for your patent

legalUpdates.disclaimer: Information provided for informational purposes only. Please refer to official sources for current information.

intro.needDocuments: You need to process {count} documents before {date} ({days} days).
intro.scanRequired: First we'll scan missing documents ({count}), then suggest additional ones
intro.generateNote: We will generate all necessary applications and show an exact action plan

requiredDocs.title: Missing documents
requiredDocs.description: For legalization you need to scan these documents
requiredDocs.importantNote: These documents are required for legal stay and work in Russia.

additionalDocs.title: Additional documents
additionalDocs.description: Mark documents you want to add for other forms
additionalDocs.tipText: Additional documents will help when generating other forms (TRP, Residence permit, contracts).

quickSelect.title: Which documents will we scan?
quickSelect.description: Mark documents you have and are ready to scan

docs.migCardDesc: Card issued at the border upon entry
docs.registrationDesc: Proof of registration at place of stay

quickSelect.importantNote: If you don't have a document - don't mark it. We will generate applications based on available data.

documentScan.scanDescription: Automatic data recognition. Fast and error-free.
documentScan.takePhoto: Take a photo of the document
documentScan.noGlare: Make sure there are no glares and all data is readable
documentScan.havePhoto: I have a 3x4 photo on white background

verification.autoRecognized: We recognized the data automatically. Correct errors if any.
verification.manualCheck: Make sure all data is entered correctly.
verification.criticalNote: An error in one letter makes the document invalid. Check each field carefully.
verification.confirmResponsibility: I confirm correctness. I take responsibility.

actionPlan.preparedPackage: We have prepared a complete legalization package
actionPlan.comeEarly: Come in the morning, shorter queue
actionPlan.whatIfNot: What happens if you don't do it?
actionPlan.entryBan: Entry ban to Russia for 3-5 years

audit.receiptsHint: Tax receipts usually exist only if you have a Patent. Check if you have a patent.

documents.contractSubtitle: Required for Eurasian Economic Union citizens

docgen.title: Document generator

docgen.tipText: All forms are generated automatically based on your data. You just need to print.

docgen.dataNotSaved: This data is not saved to your profile.
docgen.scanPassportHint: You can scan your passport to automatically fill in data
docgen.printAndSubmit: Print the document and submit to the appropriate authority. All data is formatted according to official requirements.

contract.subtitle: Standard contract with individual or legal entity

session.noQuestions: No questions available for selected category

results.failedMessage: Try again after reviewing the material

ui.tipText: Start with Learning mode to study the material with hints. Then reinforce your knowledge in Practice.

intro.description: Prepare for the exam to obtain a work patent or residence permit. Test your knowledge of Russian language, Russian history, and legal fundamentals.

practice.label: Practice
practice.description: No timer, explanations after each answer

exam.label: Exam
exam.description: 30-minute timer, explanations only at the end

results.passed: Good result! You passed the test.
results.almostPassed: Not bad, but you need 70% to pass
results.needPractice: More practice needed. You need 70% to pass

errors.loadError: Loading error. Check your internet connection.

hints.hint: Hint: Think about the key concepts related to this topic.

registration.title: Migration Registration

medical.title: Medical Examination
